conversation_examples.description: User wants to monitor loading dock for unauthorized access at night

conversation.user: I need to monitor my loading dock for unauthorized access at night
conversation.bot: I'll help you set up night security for your loading dock. Should I alert you immediately when someone is detected, or just record the events?

conversation.user: Alert me immediately and turn on the lights
conversation.bot:
Perfect! I've created a skill that will:
- Monitor for people after business hours
- Send immediate alerts
- Activate floodlights
- Record all events

Ready to deploy?
Excellent! Your 'Loading Dock Night Security' skill has been created and is ready to deploy to your cameras.

conversation_examples.description: User wants to monitor for package deliveries

conversation.user: Watch for package deliveries at my front door
conversation.bot: I'll set up package delivery monitoring for your front door. What hours should this be active? For example: business hours, all day, or specific times?

conversation.user: During business hours, 8 AM to 6 PM
conversation.bot: Got it! Should I send you notifications when packages are delivered, or would you prefer to just record the deliveries?

Perfect! Your package delivery monitor will:
- Watch for packages and delivery personnel
- Active 8 AM to 6 PM on weekdays
- Send notifications when deliveries arrive
- Record all delivery events

Shall I create this skill?
Great! Your 'Front Door Package Detection' skill is ready to deploy.

conversation_examples.description: User wants to monitor parking lot for unauthorized vehicles

conversation.user: Monitor the parking lot for unauthorized vehicles
conversation.bot: I'll help you set up vehicle monitoring for your parking lot. When should this monitoring be active?
Should I alert you about every vehicle, or only during specific conditions like after hours or in restricted areas?

conversation.user: Only after 6 PM and on weekends
conversation.bot: I understand. So I'll monitor for vehicles and alert you only after 6 PM on weekdays and all day on weekends. Does that sound right?
Excellent! Your 'Parking Lot Vehicle Monitoring' skill will track unauthorized parking during specified hours.

conversation_examples.description: User wants to monitor for crowd formation

conversation.user: I need to detect when crowds form in the lobby
conversation.bot: I'll set up crowd detection for your lobby. What should I consider a 'crowd'? For example, how many people would trigger an alert?
Got it! Should I monitor for crowds 24/7, or only during specific hours?

Perfect! Your crowd detection will:
- Monitor the lobby during business hours
- Alert when more than 10 people gather
- Record crowd formation events
- Track density levels

Ready to deploy?
Your 'Lobby Crowd Detection' skill is ready to monitor for crowd formation.

conversation_examples.description: User wants to monitor safety equipment compliance

conversation.user: Monitor workers for hard hat compliance in the construction area
conversation.bot: I'll set up safety compliance monitoring for hard hat usage. Should this run during all work hours, or specific times?

conversation.user: During work hours, 7 AM to 5 PM
conversation.bot: How should I handle compliance violations? Immediate alerts, or periodic reports?

Absolutely! Safety first. Your compliance monitor will:
- Check for hard hat usage during work hours
- Send immediate alerts for violations
- Record all safety events
- Generate compliance reports

Shall I create this?
Your 'Construction Area Safety Compliance' skill is ready to ensure worker safety.

quick_start_examples.phrase: Watch for packages at front door
Alert me about vehicles in parking lot
Detect crowds in lobby during business hours
